page.title: 18SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content:
Modern bulb_growing techniques. Computerized cattle_feeding. Computerized knitting machines. Home computers and one BBC at the school. Model aircraft building. Large scale working replica cars. Various chemical sprays used for weed_killing in crops.
Most houses have washing machines, colour television, one and often two cars, central heating. Many have dish washers and other labour saving devices. Few houses are without a telephone and there was a recent craze for "Citizen's Band" radio, which several people have in their cars or homes.
